dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'), 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') created_date, (CASE WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN s.shipment_xid ELSE sref1.shipment_refnum_value END) ref_num, TRIM(con2.first_name || ' ' || con2.last_name) from_name, (CASE WHEN loc1.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(loc1.city || ', ' || loc1.province_code || ' ' || cc1.country_name) ELSE TRIM(loc1.city || ' ' || cc1.country_name) END) load_port, (CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IN ('5332','5333') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) hs_code_show, (CASE WHEN NVL( (SELECT gpcc.classification_code FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN gtm_item_classification gic ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = gic.gtm_item_gid INNER JOIN gtm_prod_class_code gpcc ON gic.gtm_prod_class_code_gid = gpcc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid AND gpcc.gtm_prod_class_type_gid = 'HTS US' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ,'XXXYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYXXX' THEN (SELECT gpcc.classification_code FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN gtm_item_classification gic ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = gic.gtm_item_gid INNER JOIN gtm_prod_class_code gpcc ON gic.gtm_prod_class_code_gid = gpcc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid AND gpcc.gtm_prod_class_type_gid = 'SCHEDULE B' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ELSE (SELECT gpcc.classification_code FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN gtm_item_classification gic ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = gic.gtm_item_gid INNER JOIN gtm_prod_class_code gpcc ON gic.gtm_prod_class_code_gid = gpcc.gtm_prod_class_code_gid AND gpcc.gtm_prod_class_type_gid = 'HTS US' WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) END) hs_code, cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value cut_date, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') sail_date, (CASE WHEN loc2.country_code3_gid = 'MEX' THEN loc2.location_name ELSE TRIM(loc2.province_code || ' ' || loc2.country_code3_gid) END) origin, cv.voyage_name vessel, cvra.charter_voyage_refnum_value voyage_number, (CASE WHEN loc3.country_code3_gid IN ('USA','CAN') THEN TRIM(loc3.city || ', ' || loc3.province_code || ' ' || cc3.country_name) ELSE TRIM(loc3.city || ' ' || cc3.country_name) END) discharge_port, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,990')) || ' Containers' containers, (SELECT sref1.shipment_refnum_value FROM shipment_refnum sref1 WHERE sref1.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'ITN') aes_number, (CASE WHEN loc2.country_code3_gid = 'MEX' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) mexico_yn FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.port_of_load_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc1 ON loc1.country_code3_gid = cc1.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.source_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON s.port_of_dis_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code cc3 ON loc3.country_code3_gid = cc3.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON srn.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvra ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvra.charter_voyage_gid AND cvra.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip2 ON s.shipment_gid = sip2.shipment_gid AND sip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con2 ON sip2.involved_party_contact_gid = con2.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_xid contract_number, COALESCE(obr1.remark_text, (SELECT it.item_name FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1)) commodity, obr2.remark_text delivery_port FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_type_gid = 'SCOULAR.SALES_ORDER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_COMMODITY DETAIL' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_DESTINATION PORT' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID UNION ALL SELECT '' contract_number, (SELECT it.item_name FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN packaged_item pi ON ssul.packaged_item_gid = pi.packaged_item_gid INNER JOIN item it ON pi.item_gid = it.item_gid WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) commodity, '' delivery_port FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID)

SELECT a.label, a.report_text FROM (SELECT 'A' order_by, 'Special Instructions:' label, TRIM(obr1.remark_text || (CASE WHEN NOT obr2.remark_text IS NULL THEN CHR(13) || CHR(13) || obr2.remark_text ELSE '' END)) report_text FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_type_gid = 'SCOULAR.SALES_ORDER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID UNION SELECT 'B' order_by, 'Other Terms:' label, obr3.remark_text report_text FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_type_gid = 'SCOULAR.SALES_ORDER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr3.order_base_gid AND obr3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_OTHER SPECIAL TERMS' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID UNION SELECT 'C' order_by, 'Additional Notes:' label, TRIM(srem1.remark_text || ' ' || srem2.remark_text) report_text FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_type_gid = 'SCOULAR.SALES_ORDER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ADDITIONAL NOTES' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem2 ON s.shipment_gid = srem2.shipment_gid AND srem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.ADDITIONAL NOTES NOT ON MBL' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID) a WHERE NOT a.report_text IS NULL ORDER BY a.order_by

SELECT DISTINCT obrns1.ob_refnum_value shipper, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrns4.ob_refnum_value END) shipper_address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrns5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrns8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrns8.ob_refnum_value END) s_city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN NOT obrns9.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrns9.ob_refnum_value END) shipper_phone, (CASE WHEN NOT obrns10.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrns10.ob_refnum_value END) shipper_fax FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns1 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns1.order_base_gid AND obrns1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns2 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns2.order_base_gid AND obrns2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns3 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns3.order_base_gid AND obrns3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns4 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns4.order_base_gid AND obrns4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns5 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns5.order_base_gid AND obrns5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns6 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns6.order_base_gid AND obrns6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns7 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns7.order_base_gid AND obrns7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns8 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns8.order_base_gid AND obrns8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns9 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns9.order_base_gid AND obrns9.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER PHONE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrns10 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrns10.order_base_gid AND obrns10.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_SHIPPER FAX' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT obrnc1.ob_refnum_value consignee, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrnc2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrnc2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrnc3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrnc3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrnc4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrnc4.ob_refnum_value END) consignee_address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrnc5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrnc5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrnc6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrnc6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrnc7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrnc7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrnc8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrnc8.ob_refnum_value END) c_city_state_zip FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc1 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc1.order_base_gid AND obrnc1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONSIGNEE NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc2 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc2.order_base_gid AND obrnc2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONS ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc3 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc3.order_base_gid AND obrnc3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONS ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc4 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc4.order_base_gid AND obrnc4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONS ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc5 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc5.order_base_gid AND obrnc5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONS CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc6 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc6.order_base_gid AND obrnc6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONS PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc7 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc7.order_base_gid AND obrnc7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONS ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrnc8 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrnc8.order_base_gid AND obrnc8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CONS COUNTRY CODE' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT obrn1.ob_refnum_value party, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrn4.ob_refnum_value END) address, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || (SELECT country_name FROM country_code WHERE country_code3_gid = obrn8.ob_refnum_value) END) city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN NOT obrn9.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrn9.ob_refnum_value END) phone, (CASE WHEN NOT obrn10.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value END) fax, (CASE WHEN NOT obrn11.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrn11.ob_refnum_value END) email FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NOTIFY NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn2 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn2.order_base_gid AND obrn2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn9 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn9.order_base_gid AND obrn9.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP PHONE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn10 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn10.order_base_gid AND obrn10.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP FAX' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn11 ON ssul.order_base_gid = obrn11.order_base_gid AND obrn11.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_NP EMAIL' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN obrn1.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) also_notify, CHR(13) || TRIM('ALSO NOTIFY: ' || obrn1.ob_refnum_value || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn2.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn2.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn3.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn3.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn4.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE chr(10) || obrn4.ob_refnum_value END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn5.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE obrn5.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn6.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn6.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn7.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn7.ob_refnum_value END) || (CASE WHEN NVL(TRIM(obrn8.ob_refnum_value),'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX') = 'XXXYYYZZZYYYXXX' THEN '' ELSE ' ' || obrn8.ob_refnum_value END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN NOT obrn9.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrn9.ob_refnum_value END) || ' ' || (CASE WHEN NOT obrn10.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrn10.ob_refnum_value END) || ' ' || (CASE WHEN NOT obrn11.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN obrn11.ob_refnum_value END)) also_notify_party FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_type_gid = 'SCOULAR.SALES_ORDER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn1.order_base_gid AND obrn1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP NAME' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn2.order_base_gid AND obrn2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP ADDRESS LINE 1' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn3.order_base_gid AND obrn3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP ADDRESS LINE 2' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn4 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn4.order_base_gid AND obrn4.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP ADDRESS LINE 3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn5 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn5.order_base_gid AND obrn5.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP CITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn6 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn6.order_base_gid AND obrn6.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP PROVINCE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn7 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn7.order_base_gid AND obrn7.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP ZIP CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn8 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn8.order_base_gid AND obrn8.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP COUNTRY CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn9 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn9.order_base_gid AND obrn9.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP PHONE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn10 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn10.order_base_gid AND obrn10.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP FAX' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obrn11 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrn11.order_base_gid AND obrn11.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_ALSO NP EMAIL' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID

SELECT ROWNUM rnum, a.* FROM (SELECT ssu.tag_3 container_number, ssu.tag_1 seal_number, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight*1000,0), '999,999,990')) unit_weight FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID ORDER BY container_number ) a ORDER BY rnum

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight*1000,0)), '999,999,990')) || ' KG' total_weight FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON s.shipment_gid = sstopd.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID GROUP BY ssu.unit_net_weight_uom_code

SELECT (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(ssur.refnum_value) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur ON sunit.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1) = 0 THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,990')) || ' BULK' ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.count_of_pieces_shipment_bco(:SHIPMENT_ID) END) quantity FROM DUAL
